articles.description: As Eli Drinkwitz tried to troll Kansas basketball over its NCAA investigation, the Jayhawks stomped Missouri on its home court. Yikes.
articles.content: Missouri head football coach Eli Drinkwitz looks pretty silly after taking shots at Kansas basketball on Saturday night. His attempted troll was very funny, but in the greater context, it was an epic… [+1566 chars]

articles.title: Soak It In: UNC Teammates Drench Jalen Washington After Freshman’s Debut - 247Sports
articles.description: Freshman forward Jalen Washington navigated a long road to make his UNC debut in Saturday’s defeat of Georgia Tech.
articles.content:
CHAPEL HILL, N.C. — Jalen Washington pulled at his wet No. 13 jersey to show just how soaked it was after North Carolina’s 75-59 victory over visiting Georgia Tech on Saturday afternoon.

articles.title: Gophers land standout wide receiver Corey Crooms in transfer portal - Sports Illustrated
articles.description: The Gophers land one of the best receivers from the MAC.
articles.content:
Minnesota's receiving corps got better Saturday with news that Corey Crooms is transferring to the Gophers from Western Michigan.

articles.title: Navy fumble sets up Army win in series' first OT game - ESPN
articles.description: Army beat Navy 20-17 on Saturday in the first OT game in the 123 games of the rivalry series. It was the fifth win for the Black Knights in the past seven meetings.
